name: Sort The Sentence!
description:
A game about Learning or Studying Figurative Language!

Fast! SORT THE SENTENCE into figurative language groups!

-------------------------------(GAME-MODES)---------------------------------------------

Have ENDLESS time to sort, but if you mess up, you start over!

Go as fast as you can in PANIC MODE or you will run out of time! (You get time when you score!)

You have 60 SECONDS to score as many points as you can!
